RumorFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin in the shape of a spire.
Two Nomai waited outside this tower to travel to the Deep Storm Station.

ExploreFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin in the shape of a spire.
Two Nomai debated about the Sun Station, while waiting outside this warp tower to travel to something called the Deep Storm Station.
Nomai traveled to a new warp pad installed on the Construction Yard to enter the Deep Storm Station.

RumorFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin that resembles column formations.

ExploreFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin that resembles column formations.

RumorFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin in the shape of a mountain.

ExploreFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin in the shape of a mountain.
A Nomai named Cycad delivered a message to Timber Hearth, informing the Nomai there about an issue on Ash Twin.
After studying the issue, Oeno concluded that the issue was caused by something called the sunless day.
Oeno suggested traveling to the other tower with the same issue to better demonstrate her findings.

RumorFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin with pointed edges.

ExploreFact.Text: A tower on Ash Twin with pointed edges.
I found a scroll containing Oeno's notes explaining why the doors on Ash Twin were activating without input.
The sunless day occurs as the Hourglass Twins orbit into direct alignment with the sun, causing a combined force of gravity between the sun and the twin closer to the sun.
This combined force pulls vision orbs on Ash Twin upward as the alignment passes overhead.
Combined gravitational forces are the cause of the sand funnel between the Hourglass Twins.

RumorFact.Text: Two towers on Ash Twin joined together by an arch.

ExploreFact.Text: Two towers on Ash Twin joined together by an arch.

RumorFact.Text: Chert flew to admire the colossal solar towers on each of Ash Twin's poles on their first expedition. They wondered why the Nomai didn't build the solar panels on Ember Twin's poles as well.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai recording atop one of the solar towers that describes the Nomai's construction of the solar tower.
The solar towers on Ash Twin were deliberately built on Ash Twin's poles to avoid sunless days.
The sand funnel between the Hourglass Twins follows the sunless day.
The Nomai described plans to relocate the solar panels on Ember Twin due to issues with its current site.
